scripts.deploy-storybook-dev: npm run build-storybook && aws s3 sync storybook-static/ s3://hid-ppt-storybook-dev/ --delete
scripts.deploy-storybook-main: npm run build-storybook && aws s3 sync storybook-static/ s3://hid-ppt-storybook-main/ --delete
scripts.deploy-app-dev: npm run build && aws s3 sync dist/ s3://hid-ppt-app-dev/ --delete
scripts.deploy-app-main: npm run build && aws s3 sync dist/ s3://hid-ppt-app-main/ --delete
